function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Modeling association between people and transmission risk","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions and controls to reduce transmission risk","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, contact tracing technology","People":"Elderly, children, young people","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccurate inference of occupation levels and transmission risk","Impact":"Misjudgment of risk and inadequate control measures","Mitigation":"Regular validation of occupation data, dynamic modeling of transmission risk","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, dynamic risk modeling software","People":"School staff, public health organizations","Owner":"School administrators, public health organizations"}]}
